## Library

```{r}
library(RODBC)
```


## All Coding

```{r}
dbhandle <- odbcDriverConnect(
  'driver={SQL Server};
  server=boi-recondb;
  database=LM;
  trusted_connection=true') 

Testdf <- sqlQuery(dbhandle, "SELECT TOP 50 * FROM SecurityTypeData std")
```


### Online Resource

https://blog.learningtree.com/querying-sql-server-data-from-r-using-rodbc/


## Manual connect

Follow instructions on the site
https://turbofuture.com/computers/Connect-to-SQL-Server-from-R

```{r}
connection = odbcConnect( "boi-recondb") 

Testdf <- sqlQuery(connection, "SELECT TOP 50 * FROM SecurityTypeData std")
```
